EmailTemplate.name: PPS 45 Day Pre-Cancellation Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT NOTICE {!Case.CaseNumber} : {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Purchase Order Number: Part Number:
We have not yet received your payment for above order and this is currently 45 days or greater past due to your request date.
Please have your representative contact our credit analyst to resolve this issue. If we do not receive your payment in 14 days or an appropriate clarification of the order status, we must cancel your order.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
